Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry sure knows how to party.

It looks like the Instagram babe enjoyed a very boozy night out on Thursday as she left a charity dinner looking extremely worse for wear.

The star, 24, was enjoying an evening of partying at the Cash & Carry Charity Gala Dinner at CHAK 89 in Surrey moments before she suffered a wardrobe malfunction.

Wearing a skin-tight nude unitard with a low scoop neck, Chloe's bust was on full display and spilled out at one point during the messy night.

As usual, the stunning blonde showcased her tiny waist and curvy figure in a tight garment, which complimented her bronzed glow.

She accessorised with a mini Louis Vuitton handbag and strappy barely-there nude heels.

Her platinum blonde locks were super sleek at the start of the night, but by the end of the star-studded bash her extensions were tangled together.

(Image: JAMES CURLEY & MAGICMOMENTSUK)

(Image: JAMES CURLEY & MAGICMOMENTSUK)

The Geordie lass seemed to have overindulged slightly as she took a short break outside, stumbling on her way out of the event.

She was pictured on the stairs with her head in her hands, struggling to keep herself upright, and battled to keep her eyes open.

(Image: JAMES CURLEY & MAGICMOMENTSUK)

The beauty looked ultra happy in photos from the night, suggesting she is completely over ex boyfriend Sam Gowland.

Other celebs who enjoyed the huge bash were Love Island's Arabella Chi and Curtis Pritchard, who enjoyed a mini reunion at the event.

Chloe's night out comes days after Sam had his tattoo tribute to her covered up months after they finally ended their on and off again relationship for good.

(Image: JAMES CURLEY & MAGICMOMENTSUK)

The former Love Islander, 24, had the Geordie Shore babe's visage painted on his thigh which is now hidden underneath a new inking of a roaring bear.

Proving he is over his surgically-enhanced former flame, Sam took to Instagram on Thursday, to show off his new artwork, which he captioned: "Cover up on thigh, leg sleeve pending."

(Image: Instagram)

Sam first got the tattoo when he and Chloe appeared on MTV show Just Tattoo Of Us in November last year.

Chloe admitted that she decided on the design in order to stop Sam from being able to pull other girls.

It looks like the pair and well and truly over.
description: Chloe Ferry stuck to her Geordie Shore antics on Thursday evening as she partied hard
